name: Save tray config in Memory
Init flow Variables
Save Settings to File
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(global.get('tray'),null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty};

name: Readings Alarm Scan
Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Read Pump
Publish tray
Save config file
Continue Tray readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',false)
return msg;

name: Archive Pulse
Allow Readings
func:
global.set('deviceInit', 0);
return msg;

name: Save flow env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Send Setting
Get Reading
func:
let command = ["?V802","?V808","?V809","?V810","?V811"];
return {topic:'readPumpStatus01',payload:command,rate:200};

name: Get pm2Name
func:
msg.payload = global.get("pm2Name");
return msg;

name: Single Archive Pulse
func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: Save global env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Get Signal Quality
Pause Readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',true)
return msg;

name: Publish tray
Init Pump
Create Readings
Create Setting
Alarm changed
Check for Permit
PostMortem
